PHRASE.LANG: kName
Gravity Crash™ Trophy
Trophée Gravity Crash™
"Gravity Crash™"-Trophäe
Trofeo Gravity Crash™
Trofeo de Gravity Crash™
kDesc
This is a trophy rewarded from the PlayStation®Network Motion Maze game. [#Legal]
Ce trophée est une récompense du jeu Labyrinthe PlayStation®Network. [#Legal]
Im "PlayStation®Network: Motion-Labyrinth"-Spiel gewonnene Trophäe. [#Legal]
Hai ottenuto questo trofeo giocando a PlayStation®Network Labirinto di Movimento. [#Legal]
Este es un trofeo del juego Laberinto de movimiento de PlayStation®Network. [#Legal]
